text: Micromonospora sagamiensis is an endophytic actinomycete, with type strain DSM 43912T. It produces sagamicin, an aminoglycoside antibiotic, as well as several mutational variants. Its cell wall contains only D-alanine. == References == ==Further reading== * * ==External links== * *LPSN *Type strain of Micromonospora sagamiensis at BacDive - the Bacterial Diversity Metadatabase Category:Micromonosporineae Category:Bacteria described in 2005
title: Micromonospora sagamiensis
